items.sentence: Tom said that he didn't remember how to use the shredder.
Tom came to the party even though he hadn't been invited.
Tom wrote a book about his bicycle trip around Australia.
I won't be your friend as long as you treat me like that.
I spoke to the boy, who seemed to be older than the girl.
Why don't you buy it and try it? It's not that expensive.
Tom kisses his wife every morning before he goes to work.
We're trying to figure out why people aren't buying this.
If you won the lottery, what's the first thing you'd buy?
Tom and Mary wandered through the streets of the village.
It was never hard for us to find something to talk about.
May I ask why it is that you don't want to talk about it?
It's no use going to school if you're not going to study.
Tom and Mary announced the dissolution of their marriage.
Tom has been trying to talk his father into buying a car.
Would it be OK if I told Tom that he didn't have to come?
We probably won't be able to move this without some help.
Fortunately, I cut the red wire instead of the green one.
Tom has asked Mary to watch his dog while he's in Boston.
Tom is one of the best saxophonists that I've ever heard.
